title: JAMES BEZEL, 3MM LAB WHITE SAPPHIRE SILVER RIVIÈRE NECKLACE
description:
NEW STONE SIZE: 3MM
Our most-worn bezel rivière in a new, daintier 3MM size. The James Bezel 3MM Rivière features lab-grown white sapphires in a bezel setting that outlines each stone with a slim border of sterling silver.
details:
Metal: Sterling silver
Setting: Bezel
Stone Type: Lab-grown white sapphire
Stone Shape: Round cut
Stone Size: 3MM
